report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2021-22573 Google OAuth Client Library for Java Vulnerability
Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2021-22573 Google OAuth Client Library for Java Vulnerability
text: Google OAuth Client Library for Java could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper verification of token signatures. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass verification on the client-side.
